  148. #if (__FreeBSD__) && (__FreeBSD_version < 400017)

  150. #include <sys/param.h>          /* ALIGN() */

  152. /*
  153. * FreeBSD 3.x has no CMSG_SPACE() and CMSG_LEN() and has the broken CMSG_DATA()
  154. */

  156. ‌#undef  CMSG_SPACE
  157. ‌#define CMSG_SPACE(l)       (ALIGN(sizeof(struct cmsghdr)) + ALIGN(l))

  159. ‌#undef  CMSG_LEN
  160. ‌#define CMSG_LEN(l)         (ALIGN(sizeof(struct cmsghdr)) + (l))

  162. ‌#undef  CMSG_DATA
  163. ‌#define CMSG_DATA(cmsg)     ((u_char *)(cmsg) + ALIGN(sizeof(struct cmsghdr)))

  165. #endif


  168. extern char **environ;


  171. #endif /* _NGX_POSIX_CONFIG_H_INCLUDED_ */
